Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2650 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 0.4.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-2650 affecting package kata-containers-cc for versions less than 0.4.1-2. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers-cc is earlier than 0.4.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-2650
